where is the saved game data?

For those wondering where the save is for Windows 7 on this crack here it is.

C:ProgramDataOrbit54

the ProgamData folder is hidden, so remember to enable hidden folders to be seen first xD

sorry, the slash does not appear, so here is the proper path

C: > ProgramData > Orbit > 54

Remember ProgramData is a hidden folder
